requests.originalRequest: Remove character limits of all Agents. `/Users/admin/Repositories/WeMake/mcp/.wemake/agents/`
requests.splitDetails: Remove character limits of all Agents. `/Users/admin/Repositories/WeMake/mcp/.wemake/agents/`

tasks.title: List all agent files
tasks.description: Use directory listing tools to identify all .md files in /Users/admin/Repositories/WeMake/mcp/.wemake/agents/ and document them in the Knowledge Graph.
tasks.completedDetails: Listed all .md files using list_dir: Code_Review.md, Deployment.md, Development.md, Documentation.md, Feature_Requests.md, Feedback.md, Orchestration.md, PRD_Building.md, Prompt_Template.md, Roadmap_Planning.md, Testing.md, Troubleshooting.md. Attempted to store in Knowledge Graph but failed due to input validation errors; proceeding with list for next tasks.

tasks.title: Analyze files for character limits
tasks.description: For each identified file, view contents and search for mentions of character limits, storing findings in Knowledge Graph.
tasks.completedDetails: Regex search revealed character limit mentions (e.g., 'under 10k chars') in all 12 agent .md files: Feedback.md (92), Documentation.md (91), Roadmap_Planning.md (95), Development.md (95), Prompt_Template.md (85), Troubleshooting.md (91), Feature_Requests.md (92), Orchestration.md (96), Deployment.md (94), Testing.md (92), Code_Review.md (92), PRD_Building.md (93). Unable to store in KG due to persistent validation errors; findings listed for editing task.

tasks.title: Edit files to remove limits
tasks.description: Based on analysis, edit each file to remove or modify character limit instructions, ensuring no breaking changes.
tasks.completedDetails: Executed shell command in agents directory: for file in *.md; do sed -i '' '/under 10k chars/d' "$file"; done. This removed the character limit instructions from each file based on prior analysis, with no other modifications to preserve functionality.

tasks.title: Verify and test changes
tasks.description: Review edited files, test any affected agents if applicable, and confirm limits are removed.
tasks.completedDetails: Verification via repeated regex search showed empty results, indicating successful removal of all character limit instructions. No testing needed as changes are to documentation files without executable components.
